reference.title: EnableDisableHandlers : To enable or disable DLL handlers

section.title: Description
section.p: This function will enable or disable different handlers depending upon the argument passed to it.

section.title: Inputs
section.p: Enum eHandlerType { all = 0, timers = all + 1, key = timers + 1, message = key + 1, error = message + 1 }
